function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate consideration of contextual factors in research findings and recommendations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased exposure to contagious diseases due to longitudinal studies and data collection during and after the pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Natural experiments may expose different groups of people to varying conditions, potentially leading to increased spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaboration and convergence research may involve increased interaction and collaboration between different research groups, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collaboration may lead to increased spread of contagious diseases due to close contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and reproducibility in research practices may lead to misinformation about disease management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imbalance between research coverage of severe problems and ’low-hanging fruits’ may lead to inadequate understanding of disease challenges","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Curtailment of field-based empirical research in regions with severe energy challenges and potential epidemic impact","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to diverse perspectives and marginalized populations in scholarly research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pressure to publish frequently and focus on short-term impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreliance on highly-cited and high-volume segments of scholarship","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in research focus and coverage due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exacerbation of existing bias in social research in energy associated with the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Loss of validity in social research in energy associated with the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limits on research approaches during the pandemic may result in important gaps in knowledge generation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct applicability of the paper may be limited due to the pandemic situation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enduring relevance of the considerations in the paper for energy social science and research practices.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential limited effectiveness of a single intervention in reducing virus transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing optimal mitigation policies to reduce peak healthcare demand and deaths.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of overwhelming health systems due to high transmission rates and uncontrolled epidemic growth.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of covid-19 due to ineffective suppression measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on health systems due to school and university closures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term feasibility and sustainability of suppression measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmissibility rebounded once controls were lifted, leading to a resurgence of cases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged maintenance of non-pharmaceutical interventions npis and drugs until a vaccine is available.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Building population immunity through epidemic without interrupting transmission completely.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in people’s response to npis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High social and economic costs of suppression strategy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High-resolution population density data used to define areas, potentially leading to high population density contact points","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of per-capita contacts within schools being double those elsewhere, potentially leading to higher transmission rates in schools","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of 5.1-day incubation period, potentially affecting the timing of disease control measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable infectiousness due to gamma distribution assumption","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Under-ascertainment of infections 40-50%","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of short-term immunity after recovery","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"30% of hospitalised cases requiring critical care","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overall mean duration of hospitalisation of 10.4 days","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ifr estimates at 0.9% 95% credible interval 0.4%-1.4%","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled spread of infectious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementation of interventions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumptions leading to underestimation of risks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unmitigated epidemic with predicted deaths","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exceeding critical care bed capacity","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High peak demand on critical care beds beyond surge capacity","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relatively little impact of stopping mass gatherings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of control measures without overwhelming healthcare systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in initiating social distancing and closure of schools and universities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the reproduction number r0 and severity of the virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged implementation of social distancing measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population-wide social distancing measures may be socially disruptive and challenging to implement.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
